thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Venezuela Is in Default, but Goldman Sachs Just Got Paid

author: Julie Wernau
title: Venezuela Is in Default, but Goldman Sachs Just Got Paid

organizations.name: goldman sachs just got paid venezuela

text:
Venezuelaâ€™s cash-strapped government stopped paying its foreign debt months ago. But a unit of Goldman Sachs Group Inc. recently received payments of tens of millions of dollars for bonds that ignited controversy last year when they were purchased at a big discount, according to people familiar with the matter.
The Venezuelan government made the payment in November, but the money had been held up by a clearing house that processes these payments over concerns that it may have been in violation of U.S. sanctions, these people...
